content.rendered:
LivX

ABOUT

LivX, a US-based real estate brand, operates with a clear mission: to empower individuals and businesses in their pursuit of property ownership and leasing. With the tagline Your Journey, Your Dreams, No Limits, LivX positions itself as a modern, client-centric real estate partner. The brand offers a full spectrum of services, assisting clients in renting, buying, and selling properties across four key sectors: rental, residential, commercial, and luxury.

SCOPE

  • Branding

INDUSTRY

Real Estate

CHALLENGES

Your Journey
Your Dreams
No limits

01

Balancing Broad Appeal and Niche Targeting

02

Differentiating in a Saturated Market

03

Integrating Modernity with Trustworthiness

04

Incorporating the “No Limits” Concept Visually

SOLUTION

Identity that takes you to the top

LivX’s branding embraced a tech-inspired aesthetic to stand out in the competitive real estate market. A bright green color was chosen to symbolize growth and energy while ensuring visibility. The letter “X” was creatively designed to form a house roof, directly linking the brand to its real estate focus. This modern and dynamic identity reinforced LivX’s promise of limitless possibilities and set it apart from traditional competitors.

Assets
Simplified

IDENTITY

The logomark features a handcrafted letter ‘X’ formed by two intersecting arrows. These arrows cleverly shape the roof of a house, symbolizing the brand’s focus on the real estate sector.

IMPACT

Empowering limitless journeys

The impact of LivX’s branding has been profound, positioning the company as a fresh, innovative leader in the real estate market. By combining a modern, tech-inspired look with a bold color palette and distinctive logo, the brand immediately stands out from competitors. This branding has helped LivX build trust, recognition, and a strong emotional connection with its audience, ultimately driving growth and differentiation in a saturated market.
